title: Sell Broadcast Ad Space
description: A company wants to buy a 30-second ad spot during the broadcast of an upcoming championship game.

tasks.description: Check the inventory of available ad spots for the championship game.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds there are still ad spots available in the third quarter.

tasks.description: Provide the company with the rate card for the available ad spots.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the pricing information to the potential advertiser.

tasks.description: Negotiate a price and process the sale of the ad spot.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sells the ad spot and generates an insertion order.
